sn2.4:1.2: Standing to one side, the god Māgadha addressed the Buddha in verse:
sn2.4:2.2: to shine their light on the world?
sn2.4:2.3: We’ve come to ask the Buddha;
sn2.4:2.4: how are we to understand this?”

sn2.4:4.3: But a Buddha is the best of lights:
